title: Shipping Policy
intro: This Shipping Policy explains how MyAZStore processes, dispatches, and delivers your orders. By placing an order, you agree to the conditions outlined below.

sections.heading: 1. Order Processing Time
content: All orders are processed within 1–2 business days.
Orders placed on weekends or holidays will be processed on the next working day.

sections.heading: 2. Estimated Delivery Time
content: Delivery timelines depend on your location and the courier partner assigned.
Most orders are delivered within 3–7 business days after dispatch.
Remote or rural locations may take additional time.

sections.heading: 3. Shipping Charges
content: Shipping fees, if applicable, will be displayed at checkout before payment.
We may offer free shipping during promotions or on minimum order amounts.

sections.heading: 4. Order Tracking
content: Once your order has been shipped, you will receive a tracking ID via email or SMS.
Tracking updates depend on the courier’s scanning frequency and regional availability.

sections.heading: 5. Delayed or Failed Delivery
content: Delays may occur due to weather, courier workload, strikes, or other unforeseen factors.
If a package cannot be delivered due to an incorrect address, incomplete information, or repeated failed delivery attempts, it may be returned to us.
In such cases, re-shipping charges may apply.

sections.heading: 6. Damaged or Missing Items
content: If you receive a damaged package or missing items, notify us within 48 hours of delivery.
Provide clear photos and order details so we can resolve the issue quickly.

sections.heading: 7. International Shipping
content: Currently, we only deliver within India.
International shipping is not available at this time.
